name: Free Online Audio Noise Reducer - ATools
description: Free online audio noise reduction tool with FFmpeg-based processing, support for WAV/MP3 formats, real-time preview.
seoDescription: Professional free online audio noise reduction tool - ATools - Uses FFmpeg afftdn filter for noise reduction, supports WAV and MP3 audio formats, real-time processing progress, audio preview before download, adjustable noise reduction strength (0-100). Completely browser-based processing, no server upload required, 100% protects audio file privacy. Clean and intuitive interface, simple and efficient operation, is a professional tool for audio post-production and noise removal. Completely free and open source, supports multiple audio formats, is the trusted audio processing tool for global content creators.

ui.firstLoadHint: Tip: First time loading ffmpeg.wasm requires downloading core files (large), may take time; all processing is done locally in browser, no server upload.
